articles.description: The Nebraska Cornhuskers have transformed their quarterback depth chart through the transfer portal, adding former Florida State Seminole Chubba Purdy to a group that includes former Texas Longhorn Casey Thompson.
articles.headline: QB Chubba Purdy chooses to transfer to Nebraska after leaving Florida State football program

images.name: Lyn-j Dixon [608x342]
images.caption: Lyn-J Dixon had 104 carries for 635 yards and six touchdowns with Clemson in 2019, but has totaled only 52 carries for 238 yards in two years since.

images.name: Kai-Leon Herbert [608x342]
images.caption: Senior Kai-Leon Herbert was the No. 99 prospect in the 2017 class. He opted out of the 2020 season and has mainly been a reserve for Miami.

images.caption: Former ESPN 300 cornerback Marcus Banks played in 23 total games with Alabama before entering the transfer portal.

articles.description: After four seasons at Northwestern, quarterback Hunter Johnson is transferring back to Clemson -- a rare transfer to Dabo Swinney's program.
articles.headline: Onetime Clemson football recruit QB Hunter Johnson transfers back to Tigers after career at Northwestern

article.description: Lenorris Footman came on for injured starter John Gibbs and accounted for six Alcorn State touchdowns as the Braves rolled past Southern, 48-7 Saturday at a rain-soaked A.W. Mumford Stadium.
article.headline: Footman amasses 6 TDs as Alcorn St. pummels Southern, 48-7
article.linkText: Footman amasses 6 TDs as Alcorn St. pummels Southern, 48-7
article.story: BATON ROUGE, La. -- Lenorris Footman came on for injured starter John Gibbs and accounted for six Alcorn State touchdowns as the Braves rolled past Southern, 48-7 Saturday at a rain-soaked A.W. Mumford Stadium. Marquis Warford raced 78 yards for the game's first score and Footman ran 44-yards for his first with 2:06 left in the first quarter. Footman found Jordan Payne from 29-yards out to start the second, staking the Braves (5-2, 4-1 Southwestern) to a 21-0 lead. Lenard Tillery punched over from the 1 for the lone Southern (4-4, 4-2) touchdown in the second to make it 21-7 at intermission. Footman scampered 17 yards for a touchdown and fired a 38-yard strike to Brandon Campbell in the third quarter to make it 35-7, then capped his day with touchdown runs of 30- and 60-yards in the fourth. Footman finished with 274 yards rushing and was 3-of-7 passing for 71 yards.
